name: Autumn Oak Hardwood
description: Premium Traditional American Coffin Casket hardwood Oak, manufactured in the USA, White cream interior with side pleated panel and Stationary hardware and handles . Beautifully lined in cream velvetAdjustable bed and mattressPlease notify us if you require a name and message to be added to the outside of the coffin.

name: Clarksburg Wooden Casket
description: With a special maple wood veneer, the Clarksburg comes with elegant inlay panelling to the sides and ends, a soft brushed-velvet interior and matching upholstered hinged casket lid .

name: Trinity Oak
description: Premium Traditional American Coffin Casket hardwood Oak, manufactured in the USA, White cream interior with side pleated panel and Stationary hardware and handles . Beautifully lined in cream velvet and single panel lidAdjustable bed and mattressPlease notify us if you require a name and message to be added to the outside of the coffin.

name: White Chased Solid Wood
description: Traditional American Casket, manufactured in USA from Solid Hardwood timber, finished in White with metal handlesAdjustable bed and mattressPlease notify us if you require a name and message to be added to the outside of the coffin.

name: Last Supper Hardwood
description: Premium Traditional Last Supper American Coffin Casket hardwood Mahogany, manufactured in the USA, White cream interior with side pleated panel and Stationary hardware and handles . Beautifully lined in cream velvet . An insert panel can be installed at an extra cost .Adjustable bed and mattress

name: Willow Pod Coffin
description: Stay a while. The Timber charme chocolat sofa is set atop an oak trim and flaunts fluffy leather back and seat cushions. Over time, this brown leather sofaâ€™s full-aniline upholstery will develop a worn-in vintage look. Snuggle up with your cutie (animal or human) and dive into a bowl of popcorn. This sofa is really hard to leave. Natural color variations, wrinkles and creases are part of the unique characteristics of this leather. It will develop a relaxed vintage look with regular use.

name: Shannon
description: A clear-finished oak coffin with bridge panels on the sides and ends. The Shannon follows a classic Irish coffin design and is shown here with brass effect metal bar handles. It is lined with a rich satin interior, available in a choice of colours .

name: Oval Walnut Tree Coffin
description: This handmade English coffin with a walnut veneer and solid maple load-bearing bar handles, giving a contrast of light and dark wood. Comes with a book and keepsake butterfly so you can personalise the coffin with a message, lyric or a reading. Plastic Free and FFMA certified

name: Oval Maple Tree Coffin
description: The Oval coffin has a more modern minimalist shape for coffin design, with its organic elliptical shape and delicate detailing. The soft sheen water-based lacquer emphasises the beautiful, rich, deep brown colour of the black American walnut, giving The Walnut Tree a feeling of comfort and calm.

name: Traditional Wreath Mould Lid
description: Traditional British Coffin hand crafted in the UK, from Quality oak veneer. Excellent finish, simple lines and classic design. Includes handles, coffin Liner and Name plate. All traditional coffins are available in the following Wood Stains: Dark Oak, Light Oak, Mahogony, Mid Oak, and Rose Click here to review all the wood stain colours we have to choose from

name: Traditional Box Lid Coffin
description: Traditional British Coffin hand crafted in the UK, from Quality oak veneer. Excellent finish, simple lines and classic design. Includes handles, coffin Liner and Name plate. All traditional coffins are available in the following Wood Stains: Dark Oak, Light Oak, Mahogony, Mid Oak, and Rose Click here to review all the wood stain colours we have to choose from

name: Traditional High raised Lid Coffin
description: Traditional British Coffin hand crafted in the UK, from Quality oak veneer. Excellent finish, simple lines and classic design. Includes handles, coffin Liner and Name plate. All traditional coffins are available in the following Wood Stains: Dark Oak, Light Oak, Mahogony, Mid Oak, and Rose Click here to review all the wood stain colours we have to choose from

name: Bamboo Shroud
description: Passages shrouds are suitable for burial or cremation, and are 100% biodegradable. They can be used as an eco-friendly and unique alternative to clothing for use in a Wicker Casket or Willow Carrier. To simplify the movement and transport of a shrouded body, we recommend using our Willow Carrier with all shrouded burials or cremations.

name: Simple Willow Coffin
description: This beautifully made Willow Rounded coffin is a similar to the Willow traditional but with rounded ends. The willow is a deciduous tree found primarily on moist soil in cold and temperate regions.

name: Bamboo Round Coffin
description: The Bamboo Rounded Coffin is similar to the traditional but with rounded ends. Bamboo comes from a group of perennial evergreen plants in the grass family, and is the fastest growing plant in the world. Produced in a UK owned Fair Trade company in China. Made from 100% natural materials. Includes cotton liner and name plate.

name: Bamboo Lattice Round Coffin
description: The Bamboo Lattice Rounded coffin is constructed of two layers of woven bamboo to give it its distinctive pattern. It is similar to the Bamboo Lattice Traditional coffin with rounded ends. Bamboo comes from a group of perennial evergreen plants in the grass family, and is the fastest growing plant in the world. Produced in a UK owned Fair Trade company in China. Made from 100% natural materials. Includes cotton liner, headrest and name plate.

name: Wicker Coffins
description: Rustic bands of natural rattan are woven together to create this beautiful wicker coffin. The dark brown colour of this coffin perfectly complements the lightly coloured rope handles and will suit any style of flowers that the coffin happens to be adorned with. Each coffin is made by hand using traditional weaving techniques.

name: Childâ€™s Curved Painted
description:
Our Childâ€™s Curved Painted Willow Coffin features tapered round ends, beautifully plaited edging and natural hand-woven willow handles. We make each Childâ€™s coffins with sensitivity in mind, each one made in our workshops in Somerset using natural willow and using completely natural processes. 
   Every wicker coffin is made with the same care and dedication that has driven our family business for over four generations.

name: Baby Crib Casket
description: Our tiny Baby Crib casket features a gently raised lid with carefully plaited edging and a set of small braided loops with wooden toggles. We make our willow Baby Crib casket with sensitivity in mind, each one made in our workshops in Somerset using natural willow and using completely natural processes. Every wicker casket is made with the same care and dedication that has driven our family business for over four generations.

name: Cane Infant Coffin
description: Our Babiesâ€™ Caskets are gently handmade in either Seagrass, Banana Leaf or Cane. Rounded at both ends with straight sides and available in a range of sensitive sizes. Plaited loops and toggles and fully fitted with natural linings, pillow and covers as standard.Â Our babies caskets have the option of being finished with an oak engraved babies nameplate, which is smaller and much more suited to our babiesâ€™ caskets. In addition we can also provide smaller ashes caskets to match in Seagrass, Banana Leaf and Cane, each fitted with a drawstring cotton bag.

name: Willow Round
description: Exclusive to Compare the Coffin. This cremation urn is beautifully made with natural BambooBamboo comes from a group of perennial evergreen plants in the grass family, and is the fastest growing plant in the world. Produced in a UK owned Fair Trade company in China. Made from 100% natural materials and 100% Bio-degradable. Includes natural cotton liner

name: Pandanus Round Upright
description: Exclusive to Compare the Coffin. This cremation urn is beautifully made with natural BambooBamboo comes from a group of perennial evergreen plants in the grass family, and is the fastest growing plant in the world. Produced in a UK owned Fair Trade company in China. Made from 100% natural materials and 100% Bio-degradable. Includes natural cotton liner

name: Traditional Octagonal
description: Exclusive to compare the coffin. These beautifully made traditional Cremation Urn, and Ash containers are available in any wood stain and or solid colour.All traditional Urns are available in the following Wood Stains: Dark Oak, Light Oak, Mahogony, Mid Oak, and Rose wood. Alternatively they can be offered in a solid colour: Linen White, Mid Blue, Pink, Deep Pink, Post Office Red, Summer Blue, Dark Blue,

name: Traditional â€“ Dark Oak
description: Exclusive to Compare the Coffin. This cremation urn is beautifully made with natural BambooBamboo comes from a group of perennial evergreen plants in the grass family, and is the fastest growing plant in the world. Produced in a UK owned Fair Trade company in China. Made from 100% natural materials and 100% Bio-degradable. Includes natural cotton liner

name: Round Bamboo
description: Exclusive to Compare the Coffin. This cremation urn is beautifully made with natural BambooBamboo comes from a group of perennial evergreen plants in the grass family, and is the fastest growing plant in the world. Produced in a UK owned Fair Trade company in China. Made from 100% natural materials and 100% Bio-degradable. Includes natural cotton liner

name: Buff Rounded
description: This English Wicker coffin is made from English Willow grown on the Somerset Levels.The willow is a deciduous tree found primarily on moist soil in cold and temperate regions . Almost all willows take root very readily from cuttings or where broken branches lie on the ground.Made by one of the UKâ€™s oldest manufacturers of willow coffins using 100 % natural materials.Includes cotton liner, headrest and name plate.

name: Willow Rounded Coffin
description: You know your dadâ€™s incredible vintage bomber jacket? The Nirvana dakota tan leather sofa is that jacket, but in couch Dialog. With super-plush down-filled cushions, a corner-blocked wooden frame, and a leather patina that only gets better with age, the Nirvana will have you looking cool and feeling peaceful every time you take a seat. Looks pretty great with a sheepskin throw, if we may say so. With use, this leather will become softer and more wrinkled and the cushions will take on a lived-in look, like your favorite leather jacket.

name: Shroud and Wicker stretcher
description: This beautifully made Shroud and Willow stretcher is a real alternative to a natural material coffin The willow is a deciduous tree found primarily on moist soil in cold and temperate regions. Almost all willows take root very readily from cuttings or where broken branches lie on the ground. Made by a co-operative of cottage industries in Poland using 100% natural materials. Includes cotton liner, headrest and name plate.

name: Gold Willow Coffin
description: Our Willow Coffins have a slightly pink and golden look, they are hand-worked by traditional basket weavers using age-old methods that have changed very little in over 2000 years. Willow is by far the ultimate in environmental recycling, willow is grown in rows of bushes and once harvested can generate back to the same height within a year. Willow has been known to grow up to 3 metres tall annually and has the ability to degrade much more quickly than conventional hardwood.

name: Cane Coffins
description: Handcrafted using woven cane, sometimes referred to as wicker or rattan, our Cane Coffins hold an off-white appearance and are skillfully finished by hand using traditional basket making techniques

name: Seagrass Coffins
description: Our Seagrass Coffins are a beautiful compliment, rustic and natural with subtle green and blue tones. They are woven by hand using yarns of twisted seagrass and finished with cane, top and bottom.

name: Banana Leaf Coffins
description: Our Childrenâ€™s Caskets are carefully handcrafted in Seagrass, Banana Leaf or Cane. Available in the curved shape (rounded end) tapering from end to end, and available in a range of finished sizes with natural rope handles and fully fitted with natural linings, pillow and covers

name: Bamboo Coffins
description: The bamboo weave is interlaced to form an attractive wicker matt that is then woven around a strong natural frame. Bamboo is one of the fastest-growing plants on Earth and has been known to grow to one meter within a day.

name: Banana Leaf Curved
description: Hand-crafted Cane coffin, made in the Traditional shape with six rope handles and a fitted cotton liner and solid wood board base.

name: White Wicker
description: Our natural and eco-friendly â€˜White Wickerâ€™ is made from a variety of organic materials. The art of wickerwork takes its heritage from the ancient craft of basket weaving. A simple design with durability, the â€˜White Wickerâ€™ is tightly hand woven by our local craftsmen in Indonesia using traditional methods passed down from generations.

name: Round ended Willow Coffin
description:
Round ended woven willow coffin.
Handwoven using natural Somerset willow grown on our farm on the Somerset Levels. Available in a variety of natural and colour options.
Standard and bespoke sizes are offered.

name: Somerset Willow Coffin
description: Traditional shape Somerset Willow Coffin. Manufactured and finished in Great Britain using natural willow with incorporated woven willow handles. Available in a variety of colour combinations and natural finishes.

name: Water Hyacinth Coffin
description: A natural hand-crafted biodegradable coffin, half round in shape â€“ or can be traditional shape (see alternative photo), made from environmentally friendly Water Hyacinth. Traidcraft Fair Trade, Plastic Free and FFMA certified

name: Pure Black Modern Urn
description:
Bold yet understated, our Pure Black Modern Cremation Urn for Ashes has been professionally and individually glazed with black pigment creating a contemporary feel to this urn. The shape of this urn is minimalistic, spherical with a tapered edge towards the top and bottom. Despite the black pigmentation of this urn the gloss glaze finish is smooth to the touch and creates a delicate undertone to the design.

Black is a strong colour symbolising power and elegance. Moreover, this urn makes a stylish statement which could also be seen as a sentiment to your loved one in life. The boldness of this piece ensures it stands out in the home, looking chic in any space. Creating a heartfelt memorial to your loved one, mirroring their individual personality.

The glaze on the Pure Black Modern urn is done by hand meaning each piece is one of a kind. This means whilst each urn is similar no two urns are the same. A beautiful tribute made especially for your loved one. This urn is suitable for both home and garden as it has been fired at over 1000Â°. Meaning it is completely resistant to any outdoor weathering. The bold aesthetic of this urn would make it a great addition to any garden or patio. It will stand out against your flowers and create a beautiful memorial and statement feature in your garden.

name: Willow Carrier
description: Passages shrouds are suitable for burial or cremation, and are 100% biodegradable. They can be used as an eco-friendly and unique alternative to clothing for use in a Wicker Casket or Willow Carrier. To simplify the movement and transport of a shrouded body, we recommend using our Willow Carrier with all shrouded burials or cremations.

name: Premium Traditional Casket
description: Traditional British Coffin hand crafted in the UK, from Quality oak veneer. Excellent finish, simple lines and extra design detailing on the lid which adds definition to the top of the coffin. Includes handles, coffin Liner and blank Nameplate. The casket is suitable for burial or cremation All traditional coffins are available in the following Wood Stains: Dark Oak, Light Oak, Mahogony, Mid Oak, and Rose Wood Click here to review all the wood stain colours we have to choose from

name: Lawn Memorial
description:
The understated beauty and elegance of this camber top headstone in polished black granite makes a truly dignified memorial for your loved one. The high quality stone with a natural flecking makes every headstone unique. Simple in design, it is guaranteed to meet the standards of any cemetery.
    
    Dark grey granite 2'6 half round lawn memorial with rustic edge and matching margin.
    
    HS 27"x21"x3" upon base 3"x24"x12".

name: Memorial with Mother and Child
description:
Dense black granite 3'8 lawn memorial with mother and child carved figure. 
    HS 38"x28"x6" upon base 6"x36"x12".

name: Headstone with Cross
description: Also known as Roman stone, Nabresina is suitable for most churchyards and has a highly distinctive appearance thanks to its pale grey flecks and fine grain. This elegant headstone has an ogee top with checks at each end, rebated sides and features an incised cross. The centrally located vase container can as an optional modification, be replaced with two containers, one at each end of the base.

name: Sacred Heart and Gates Kerbed Memorial
description: The Sacred Heart of Jesus waits in front of the Gates of Heaven on this meaningful memorial which also features a shaped book for your inscription. Shown here with optional coloured chippings, the memorial can also be made in black granite.

name: The Diamant 32
description: Diamant 32 is part of a collection of timeless coffins and urns. Inspired by the shape of a diamond, this series aims to combine form and emotion in order to ensure a dignified valediction. The highest point of the coffin is aligned with the heart of the deceased and the surface of the coffin has been shaped in a way that a single flower can be placed at this exact spot. All models are upholstered in cotton. The coffins are made of Nordic birch plywood and are available painted in black or white with a silk matt or highly polished finish.
